title: My Eyes Saw Her: Susanne & Trey
description: A two-week decision.His patience.A view from a window.Trey only wanted one thing. But once he found out I was so innocent, he gave me what I deserved.This story of Susanne and Trey will make you smile, giggle, and become emotional.There's no cheating, and yes, there's a HEA. Everyone deserves to find their Mr. Right. If you've missed the first book in this series about Samantha and Colton, and how Trey and Susanne met, please read, My Eyes Saw You. Happy reading!
author: Jordan Leger
